chart_description: The disk.await chart displays the average time, in milliseconds, for a completed I/O operation. This metric measures the time difference between when the I/O request was initiated and when it was completed. High values for this chart may indicate a disk bottleneck or slow disk performance.

dimension_descriptions.reads: The time taken, in milliseconds, to complete a read I/O operation.
dimension_descriptions.writes: The time taken, in milliseconds, to complete a write I/O operation.
